body: Both ECOWAS and AU must reduce scare-mongering in Cote d'ivoire: "The rhetoric of force in Cote d'ivoire has ironically come a couple of months after the AU declared 2010 to be the Year of Peace and Security. But what the AU failed to also do is provide sufficient information to the wider public about what this means about Africa having a "Peace and Security Architecture"..."
original_body: Both ECOWAS and AU must reduce scare-mongering in Cote d'ivoire: "The rhetoric of force in Cote d'ivoire has ironically come a couple of months after the AU declared 2010 to be the Year of Peace and Security. But what the AU failed to also do is provide sufficient information to the wider public about what this means about Africa having a "Peace and Security Architecture"..."
title: Cote d'ivoire: Reduce Scare-Mongering on "war"
